data.title: Julia Roberts Celebrity News and Gossip
data.text:
Julia Roberts is hard at work on her new movie.

The 56-year-old Oscar-winning actress got some notes from director Luca Guadagnino as they prepared to film scenes for After The Hunt on Friday (July 19) in Chiswick, England.

For her time on set, Julia showed off her newly dyed blonde hair while wearing a black blazer over a white T-shirt paired with white trousers.

Earlier in the week, Julia was seen in the same outfit on set of the movie in Dukes Meadows.

Julia stars in the new movie from the Challengers director alongside Andrew Garfield, Ayo Edebiri, Chloe Sevigny, Michael Stuhlbarg, Lio Mehiel, Ariyan Kassam, and Will Price.

Written by Nora Garrett, “After the Hunt is an intense dramatic thriller about a college professor (Roberts) who finds herself at a personal and professional crossroads when a star pupil levels an accusation against one of her colleagues, and a dark secret from her own past threatens to come to light,” according to Deadline.

Just recently, Julia‘s brother Eric Roberts (who is the father of Emma Roberts) revealed why he’s not allowed to talk about them in interviews.

The stars are all out to enjoy some tennis!

Several celebrities were seen in the stands during Day 14 of the 2024 Wimbledon Tennis Championships on Sunday (July 14) held at the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club in London, England.

Catherine, Princess of Wales (AKA Kate Middleton) made a standing ovation-earning arrival alongside daughter Princess Charlotte and sister Pippa Middleton.

Keep reading to find out more…More Here! »

Production for Julia Roberts‘ new movie has officially begun!

The 56-year-old Oscar-winning actress was all smiles as she debuted her newly-dyed blonde hair on set of After the Hunt with director Luca Guadagnino on Tuesday (July 9) in Cambridge, England.

For her time on set, Julia first wore a gray plaid blazer over a white T-shirt paired with white jeans before changing into a black blazer to film another set of scenes.

Keep reading to find out more…More Here! »

Emma Roberts opened up in a new interview with Variety, and she had a lot to say.

The 33-year-old Space Cadet actress reflected on everything from her experience at Nickelodeon after the release of the Quiet on Set docuseries to her movie, Madame Web, underperforming at the box office.

She even opened up about if she’d share the screen with her very famous aunt Julia Roberts and revealed two roles that got away. One of them was at the very start of her career, and it went to another huge star.

Scroll through the slideshow for the biggest takeaways from Emma Roberts’ interview…

How would you spend your first Hollywood paycheck? That’s likely a question you’ve asked yourself before.

So many of us have probably imagined buying designer clothes, cool cars or amazing tech if we were ever to get paid like a star. And while it might be a pipe dream for many, it’s a reality for certain stars who did just that.

However, other stars have revealed some more… unexpected purchases that they’ve made after landing their first big pay day.

One star took their family bowling, and a former child actor recalled buying their very own ice cream truck. Someone headed straight to the pet store to take home an unlikely new pet.

A famous actor even bought a gift for someone else’s grandma! How sweet is that?!

We rounded up stars who have discussed their first big purchases. The list even includes someone who dropped $1 million in a day and wound up overdrawing their bank account and a Marvel actor who blew through $75,000 in the blink of an eye.

See what they bought and what their estimated net worth is years into their successful careers.

Scroll through the slideshow to see how all of these celebrities spent their first big paychecks…
